projects.name: Simple Todo App
description: Developed a simple to-do application using React, Recoil, and Axios to manage tasks.
Implemented full CRUD operations against a mock API.
Styled a clean, responsive interface with Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
description: Built a personal website with React and JavaScript, emphasizing interactive UI and frontend functionality.
Deployed to GitHub Pages with a custom domainâ€”configured DNS and enabled HTTPS.
Used JSON for client-side data management, simulating database interactions.

projects.name: Initiate News
description: Built a server using ASP.NET Core Web API and SQL Server, with unit tests written in NUnit.
Applied dependency injection to integrate ChatGPT and NewsAPI services.
Leveraged Entity Framework to expose a RESTful JSON API for data access.

projects.name: Game Sales
description: Implemented an online game store using ASP.NET Core MVC for a robust, user-friendly platform.
Led architecture and model design to ensure scalability and maintainability.
Authored and executed end-to-end tests with Selenium, enhancing reliability.

projects.name: Lot Tracking System
description: Designed a client-server architecture with C# and SQL Server.
Developed a WPF UI using MVVM and connected it to the server via a REST API.
Built an ASP.NET Web API backend integrated with SQL Server through Entity Framework.

projects.name: Personal Website
description: Created a personal website using Blazor and ASP.NET Core.
Deployed the site and integrated database connectivity through RESTful APIs.

projects.name: Patent Application (No.10893478)
description: Authored Patent Application No. 10893478: Scheduling algorithm for base-station search in multi-SIM devices.

projects.name: Galaxy S, Note and Watch
description: Contributed to the Galaxy S, Note, and Watch series at Samsung Electronics, focusing on dual-SIM standby architecture and power optimization in idle mode.
